thread.section_title: Always Riding Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.alwaysriding.co.uk
thread.title: Emma

author: Emma
title: Emma
text: I was on the hunt for the 'snow' insert for my Bern cycling helmet so I could take it skiing. I saw that Always Riding had one on their website, but it wasn't very clear if it was the one I was after and if it would work with my helmet model. I emailed them and got a response very quickly, the lady who responded was extremely helpful and did some investigating to see whether it was the correct helmet insert I needed. Not only was the price competitive, it also arrived within 2 days and was nicely wrapped. Would definitely recommend them!
